User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap
Sitemap: https://carnivalldn.com/sitemap.xml

# Disallow admin areas
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /scanner/
Disallow: /analytics/

# Allow all other content
Allow: /events
Allow: /privacy-policy
Allow: /terms-of-service
Allow: /cookie-policy

# Crawl delay (optional)
Crawl-delay: 1
